name: Míhún Chē
summary: Míhún Chē (迷魂車), more commonly known as BB Car (屁屁車) or eventually Ecstasy Car and Super Car (奇妙車) is a port of Rally-X and New Rally-X made for the Famicom by Hwang Shinwei in 1988. It was originally published by Chi Chi Toy Co., Ltd under the Mi Hun Che and Super Car title. BB Car is a slight update released 3 years later, in 1991.

name: Mírame
summary:
Jai Bhagwan, a 57-year-old Indian cyclist, spent 10 hours 44 minutes and 5 seconds cycling non-stop. He covered 202.1km. A pathetic figure that a new rider is set to beat, come what may.
Jai Bhagwan wasn't half the cyborg, nor was he half as divorced as the protagonist of this story is.
